events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing the details.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on relevant keywords and skills shown in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's application moving forward.
The candidate passed the initial screening stage after demonstrating strong experience with software development and relevant technologies.
Received a prompt and detailed response from the candidate confirming availability and interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
